Dylan Ward (born August 19, 1993) is an American professional stock car racing driver. He currently competes in the zMAX CARS Tour, driving the No. 7 for Dylan Ward Racing. He is the brother of fellow racing driver Trevor Ward, who also competes in the series.
Ward has also competed in series such as the SMART Modified Tour, the Virginia Late Model Triple Crown Series, the Carolina Pro Late Model Series, and the NASCAR Weekly Series, and is a frequent competitor at Bowman Gray Stadium.
